name: gitdownloader
description: This task will download git repository as an addition to default source. Consider this task as workaround where TFS build with git repository can only download 1 repository. Then this task will download another git repository required by your TFS build definition. This task assumes that git is already installed in PATH environment variable or %ProgramFiles%\\Git within TFS build agent's machine.
author: Fakhrulhilal Maktum
